env.info: (hold 10) (plate 18) (at 0 8) (sort 1 human) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 desk) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 television) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 chair) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 bed) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 refrigerator) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (sort 7 closet) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (type 7 container) (closed 7) (sort 8 cupboard) (size 8 big) (at 8 8) (type 8 container) (opened 8) (sort 9 microwave) (size 9 big) (at 9 9) (type 9 container) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small) (color 10 yellow) (sort 11 book) (size 11 small) (color 11 green) (sort 12 book) (size 12 small) (color 12 white) (sort 13 bottle) (size 13 small) (color 13 green) (sort 14 bottle) (size 14 small) (color 14 blue) (sort 15 can) (size 15 small) (color 15 green) (sort 16 cup) (size 16 small) (color 16 white) (sort 17 remotecontrol) (size 17 small) (sort 18 cup) (size 18 small) (color 18 black)

test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:cons_not (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y bed))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y chair))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y microwave))) )
test.nl: The door of refrigerator is closed. The door of microwave is opened. Do not open the refrigerator. The black cup must be on the plate. Put a book on the bed. Put a bottle in the cupboard. Put the yellow book on the chair. Pick up the can. Take out remotecontrol from cupboard. Put a cup in microwave.
